job.title: Applied Data Scientist
job.description:
Do you want to be a part of a new & growing team for one of the Top overseas E-Commerce Companies in the World? With a 20 billion dollar company valuation and Walmart as it's primary stakeholder- this Full-time Pre-Ipo company is a highly sought out opportunity for Data Scientists looking to join a new, high-visibility team for a lucrative overseas brand that is starting it's roots here in Seattle, Washington. Come be a part of a collaborative team that celebrates flexibility and employee growth.


About the Role:


One of the areas of research in the U.S. will be natural language bots making it easier for shoppers to find products quickly and get answers to their product and customer questions.


Data Science techniques adopted span classification, regression, clustering, matrix factorization, graphical model, tree-based models, network and graph algorithms, topic modeling, image processing, deep learning, and NLP - each one of them being applied across large scale initiatives.


If you aspire to redefine ‘state-of-the-art’ and create an impact in the online shopping landscape, this Data Science team can offer you the right podium to solve challenging real-world problems and take a giant leap in your career as a Data Scientist.


What You'll Bring:


•A Master's degree in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Operations Research, or equivalent discipline.


• At least 4-5+ years of work experience as a data scientist


• Proven ability to ship NLP or Computer Vision applications


• Experience with deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch


• Able to write production-level code, which is well-written and explainable • Deep experience with Python


• Familiarity with data visualization tools


• Experience using ML libraries


Benefits:


• Lucrative Total compensation in addition to exclusive stock options and competitive bonuses


• Pre-IPO opportunity for a multi-billion-dollar valuated company


• Flexibility and autonomy to take lead on high-visibility NLP projects


• Great growth opportunities for a new & developing team


• Full Medical, Dental & Vision benefits
